text: Alessandro Carrera (born 1954 in Lodi, Lombardy) is an Italian poet and translator.Peter Carravetta, Del postmoderno., by Alessandro Carrera He is Director of Italian Studies and Graduate Director of World Cultures & Literatures at the University of Houston.Alessandro Carrera. title: Alessandro Carrera
